creator: Ramirez! Flashbang!
title: How To Lolcat
description: This project describes the steps to create a lolcat image, focusing on key elements like the cat's eyes, positioning, and the background to enhance the humor.
steps: Capture the detailed characteristics of the cat's eyes, noting wideness and tilt, to convey emotion and focus within the image or video.
Consider the cat's positioning within the frame, as it contributes to the humor. An example is the cat standing on a paint drum, adding to the comedic effect.
Use the background to draw attention to outrageous or irrelevant aspects of the picture if the cat is not looking at the camera.
End with a message of "Kitty Love."
